title: Wangzhe Rongyao: Rongyao Zhi Zhang

alternative_titles.ja: 王者荣耀：荣耀之章碎月篇

synopsis: The exciting 3D series revolves around the main character Li Bai and focuses on the main theme of "love and homecoming." The story invites the viewer to take an adventurous journey with Li Bai to the city of Chang'an on the mainland of Glory of Kings. The young man investigates, discovers the truth and solves the case of his hometown, the City of Broken Moon, demonstrating the pursuit of truth, goodness and beauty in a positive, courageous and forward-looking spirit. In pursuit of a higher purpose, young Li Bai leaves his family and embarks on a long journey. However, a letter from his family, which affects the wanderer's thoughts of returning to his hometown, brings about a shocking crisis that affects Chang'an.
